name: Notary Services
description: Make your life easier by using our notary services! Notary services are available to RCU Members only.
fullDescription: Make your life easier by using our notary services! Notary services are available to RCU Members only.
whatTheyOffer: Make your life easier by using our notary services! Notary services are available to RCU Members only.
howToGetIt: If required, bring a credible witness. RCU employees can't act as a witness. If a witness is required, please bring someone who knows you personally, and can vouch for your identity. To Schedule an appointment: https://appointment.redwoodcu.org/meeting-methods?_gl=11nbosic_gaMTk3NDI0OTY2Ni4xNzQ5MjMxNzA1_ga_0197M3ERWBczE3NDkyMzE3MDQkbzEkZzEkdDE3NDkyMzIwNzIkajIyJGwwJGgw
cost: For notarization of non-RCU documents, $15 per signature is required by California state law.
